sentences.en: Atticus crossed his knee and folded his arms.
sentences.cn: 阿迪克斯跷起二郎腿,操起两只胳膊.

sentences.en: Atticus sat down in the swing and crossed his legs.
sentences.cn: 阿迪克斯在悬椅上坐下来,跷起二郎腿.
阿迪克斯的话音很平静.

sentences.en: Greeks still use some ancient sites, such as the Pnyx and the Theater of Atticus.
sentences.cn: 希腊仍旧用一些古代场所, 例如普尼克斯山和希罗得.阿题库剧院.

sentences.en: Greeks still use some ancient sites, such as the Pnyx and the Theater of Herodes Atticus.
sentences.cn: 希腊人仍在使用一些古代的场所，如普尼克斯和希罗德•阿提库剧场。

sentences.en: I looked down and saw Atticus strolling around with his hands in his pockets.
sentences.cn: 我朝下望去,看见阿迪克斯双手揣在口袋里,踱来踱去.

sentences.en: I waited, on tenterhooks, for Uncle Jack to tell Atticus my side of it.
sentences.cn: 我提心吊胆地等着杰克叔叔告诉阿迪克斯我的理由.

sentences.en: The movie studio wanted Rock Hudson to Atticus Finch.
sentences.cn: 制片厂打算让罗克·赫德森饰演阿提库斯·芬奇.
